answer:
QUESTION

can one perform salatut tasbeeh in jamaat. please substantiate with proof and were these hadiths can be founded

ANSWER


Share:

Salaatul Tasbeeh may be performed individually and not in Jamaat (congregation).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
